about_the_game:
When a man named Matthew Jarvis realizes that he has had enough of putting up with his BS job at Macro Hard Motors, He decides to finally resign from his livelihood in a rather unprofessional manner. Matthew assassinate his shmuck of a boss MR. Grumble with a stapler gun and proceeds to inflict absolute unmerciful chaos and mayhem upon his coworkers. Play as Matthew as he psychotically destroys office furniture, eliminates coworkers, fights security guards and battles his managers to the death!

Explore the Macro Hard Motors corporate office building and experience all sorts of weird and whacky scenarios with your ex colleagues.

As you progress, you will be able to acquire a wide variety of destructive weapons to inflict immense damage upon your environment such as a stapler, scissors, toilet plunger, an axe, etc.

Score as much mayhem points as you possibly can in order to unlock new descending floors and to eventually free yourself from this monotonous hellhole for good.

Once you've played through the main story, there will be other new fun and whacky game modes to try out as well. :)

content_descriptors.notes: This product contains strong language, drug references, violence, sexual acts and themes, use of firearms, explosives, fire and cartoonish blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: built in

short_description: A third person action game where you are sick and tired of working your BS job for your BS boss. You have officially lost your mind and are ready to cause absolute mayhem and chaos in your workplace. Turn ordinary office supplies into weapons of mass destruction and destroy your colleagues!
